website_summaries.verdict: An affordable way to make multiple small waffle bowls at the same time.
pros: The best part of the J-Jati waffle bowl maker is that it makes four bowls at a time, making it great for families
Setup instructions are clear and helpful
When they say non-stick, they really mean it – waffles pop right out, leaving no mess behind
cons: Bowls are quite small, about 1 inch
Not necessarily bad, but something to keep in mind

customer_reviews.title: Waffle bowls are too small about an inch and a half big
customer_reviews.text: A question was asked, "what is the size of the finished waffles cups", and the seller, Smoking Daily Deal, replied "they make a 4" each". I purchased this item based on that answer, and it was inaccurate. This waffle maker makes tiny little waffle bowls about an inch and a half big. Which is way too small for what I wanted it for, making scrambled eggs with meat and veggies and putting it inside waffle bowls for breakfasts. It would be great if you're looking for tiny waffle bowls, I cant think of a reason for them, but there probably is, lol. I am returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Shameless

customer_reviews.title: Small molds
customer_reviews.text: Got this little thing about a year ago and it is still doing its job. I only use it ocassionally when I want to surprise my guests with interesting hors d'oeuvres... the cups are very small so I only use it for a spoonful of filling. The machine is easy to clean non-stick easy to use and generally a good quality product... if only the cups were a little bigger
customer_reviews.author: Virgo2003

customer_reviews.title: Small cups for smaller portions.
customer_reviews.text: Makes a smaller cup for a more petite cup. Great for appetizers. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ajohn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making bite size snack waffle with ice cream and chocolate syrup
customer_reviews.author: Testimonger

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product... You can do so much with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: J L

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Made mini sloppy joe bread cups with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smitten with this little thing
customer_reviews.text: Finally opened this little appliance to make a large batch of bite size waffle bowls to fill with an apple pie compote. I'm in love. One caveat: the fill line is too high. I'm only filling it about 2/3 of the way to the built in fill line, and they are turning out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Leming

customer_reviews.title: condensate on the baking surface during baking.
customer_reviews.text: ++ My waffle maker works perfectly. It's really non-stick waffle cup maker. I like it and use probably twice a month. -- The cups are very small. Plastic to gets yellow near the baking surface. There is too much condensate on the baking surface during baking.
customer_reviews.author: Goluptious

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for anything other than small desserts
customer_reviews.text: SO SMALL. Not recommended for anything other than small desserts.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: What a joke!
customer_reviews.text: When I read one of the lower rated reviews before I bought this, I couldn't imagine how small it was. It is like something for an 8 year old girl. I'd give it a zero if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Leone

customer_reviews.title: Great for family nights!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for!!! I can't wait to make cookie bowls with my grandchildren!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Miles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it, made these with my grandbabies....they loved it too
customer_reviews.author: felicia murray

customer_reviews.title: NOT 4"-size pies as advertised... more like 2"
customer_reviews.text: False advertising. These are more like 2" waffle bowls, not 4" as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Prince

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The outside was scratched and it is really hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Shores

customer_reviews.title: The only one available online with 4 cups at a ...
customer_reviews.text: The only one available online with 4 cups at a time not to mention the price but I wish came different colors or a timer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
